title: Axiom Constraint Verification Matrix (ACVM) Configuration

metadata.description: Governance metadata for schema tracking and profiling.

schema_version.description: Version identifier for the ACVM schema structure.

performance.description: GAX I Constraints: Operational throughput and efficiency thresholds.

max_structural_violations.description: Maximum tolerable integer threshold for structural policy violations.
